movies.title: Ion: Blestemul pamîntului, blestemul iubirii
movies.plot: Set in the 1910's Transylvanian countryside, a poor but industrious peasant must choose between his obsessive lust for riches and his desire for true love.
movies.simplePlot: Set in the 1910's Transylvanian countryside, a poor but industrious peasant must choose between his obsessive lust for riches and his desire for true love.

biography.bio: Serban Ionescu was born on September 23, 1950 in Corabia, Jud. Olt, Romania. He was an actor, known for Maria (2003), 15 (2005) and Ion: Blestemul pamîntului, blestemul iubirii (1980). He was married to Magda Catone. He died on November 21, 2012 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Serban Ionescu

biography.bio: Ioana Craciunescu was born on November 13, 1950 in Bucuresti, Romania. She is an actress, known for Ion: Blestemul pamîntului, blestemul iubirii (1980), Intamplari cu Alexandra (1989) and Promisiuni (1985).
biography.name: Ioana Craciunescu

biography.bio: Petrica Gheorghiu was born on June 20, 1929 in Iasi, Romania. He is known for his work on Terminus paradis (1998), The Moromete Family (1987) and Totul pentru fotbal (1982). He died on August 6, 2000.
biography.name: Petrica Gheorghiu

biography.bio: Valentin Teodosiu was born on September 17, 1953 in Romania. He is an actor, known for Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008), Assassination Games (2011) and Gadjo dilo (1997).
biography.name: Valentin Teodosiu

biography.bio: Ion Besoiu was born on March 11, 1931 in Sibiu, Sibiu, Romania. He was an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Bucharest Non Stop (2015) and Toate pînzele sus (1976). He died on January 18, 2017 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Ion Besoiu

biography.bio: Leopoldina Balanuta was born on December 10, 1934 in Paulesti, Vrancea County, Romania. She was an actress, known for Stone Wedding (1973), The Oak (1992) and Dincolo de pod (1977). She died on October 14, 1998 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Leopoldina Balanuta

biography.bio: Octavian Cotescu was born on February 14, 1931 in Dorohoi, Botosani, Romania. He was an actor, known for Operation Monster (1976), Saltimbancii (1981) and Circus Performers at the North Pole (1984). He died on August 22, 1985 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Octavian Cotescu

biography.bio: Tamara Buciuceanu-Botez was born on August 10, 1929 in Tighina, Moldova. She is an actress, known for Papa vient dimanche (2012), Liceenii Rock 'n' Roll (1992) and Au diable Staline, vive les mariés! (2008).
biography.name: Tamara Buciuceanu-Botez

biography.bio: Catrinel Dumitrescu is an actress, known for Aurora (2010), Bucharest Identity Card (1982) and Casatorie cu repetitie (1985). She was previously married to Emil Hossu.
biography.name: Catrinel Dumitrescu

biography.bio: Romeo Pop is an actor, known for Portile albastre ale orasului (1974), The Oak (1992) and Schimb valutar (2008).
biography.name: Romeo Pop

biography.bio: Rodica Negrea was born on December 25, 1956 in Târgu-Mures, Mures, Romania. She is an actress, known for Sex Traffic (2004), The Zero Theorem (2013) and Still Center (2005).
biography.name: Rodica Negrea

biography.bio: Sorina Stanculescu is an actress, known for Ion: Blestemul pamîntului, blestemul iubirii (1980) and Mijlocas la deschidere (1982).
biography.name: Sorina Stanculescu

biography.bio: Valeria Seciu was born on September 1, 1939 in Bucuresti, Romania. She is an actress, known for Des Escargots et des Hommes (2012), I'm an Old Communist Hag (2013) and Ahead of the Silence (1978).
biography.name: Valeria Seciu

biography.bio: Costel Constantin was born on October 20, 1942 in Galati, Romania. He is an actor, known for Portile albastre ale orasului (1974), Amurgul fantanilor (1983) and Eu sunt Adam! (1996).
biography.name: Costel Constantin

biography.bio: Petre Lupu was born on November 2, 1946 in Mogosesti, Iasi, Romania. He is an actor, known for The Rest is Silence (2007), Train of Life (1998) and Fata Morgana (1982).
biography.name: Petre Lupu
